trust such as your partner, 
your mum, a friend, or to your 
midwife or health visitor, about 
how you are feeling.
It	can	help	a	lot	just	to	confide	in	
someone else. Once they know 
how you are feeling, they will be 
able to give you support.
If you become more unhappy 
or upset, or if your low mood 
lasts more than a week, then 
you are probably experiencing 
something other than the baby 
blues.
Postnatal depression 
Postnatal	depression	affects	1	
in 10 women following the birth
